text: [Music]
I think it would be better to say I
refer in sight to all kinds of
references Paul when he was uh preaching
on Mars Hill this is acts 17 he was
preaching to the philosophers he quoted
Greek philosophers he quoted Pagan
philosophers when he was talking to
pagans that's not the same as to say he
Incorporated Pagan elements into his
message so I think I wouldn't say I'm
incorporating what other religions say
as much as I'm um uh citing them
referring to them uh appreciating them
uh in many cases contrasting
Christianity with them for clarity sake
but uh uh generally not beating them up
but not incorporating insights from
other religions not
really
